BoolProperty.Name: LinkLibraryDependencies
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether or not library outputs from project dependencies are automatically linked in.

BoolProperty.Name: UseLibraryDependencyInputs
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether or not the inputs to the librarian tool are used rather than the library file itself when linking in library outputs of project dependencies.

BoolProperty.Name: EchoCommandLines
BoolProperty.Description: If true, the commands emcc is invoked with are printed to stdout during linking.

EnumProperty.Name: TypedArrays
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies the compilation mode for typed arrays. See https://github.com/kripken/emscripten/wiki/Code-Generation-Modes.

EnumValue.Name: NotSet
EnumValue.DisplayName: Not set (default to Shared typed arrays)

BoolProperty.Name: RunClosureCompiler
BoolProperty.Description: If true, the Closure Compiler is run as part of the build.

BoolProperty.Name: RunMinify
BoolProperty.Description: If true, a minification process will be executed for the generated JavaScript code.

BoolProperty.Name: IgnoreDynamicLinking
BoolProperty.Description: Normally emcc will treat dynamic linking like static linking, by linking in the code from the dynamic library. This fails if the same dynamic library is linked more than once. With this option, dynamic linking is ignored, which allows the build system to proceed without errors. However, you will need to manually link to the shared libraries later on yourself.Disregards dynamic library linkingminification process will be executed for the generated JavaScript code.

StringListProperty.Name: PreJsFile
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies a .js file to embed to the beginning of the generated script file, before running optimizations on the file.

StringListProperty.Name: PostJsFile
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies a .js file to embed to the beginning of the generated script file, after optimizations have been performed.

StringListProperty.Name: EmbedFile
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies a list of resource files to embed inside the generated JavaScript file.

StringListProperty.Name: PreloadFile
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies a list of resource files to preload for the HTML page before running the compiled JavaScript code.

StringListProperty.Name: HtmlShellFile
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies the .html file template inside which the generated JavaScript code will be generated to.

StringListProperty.Name: JsLibrary
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies additional JavaScript libraries to link the generated code with.
